I need to add these fields to the Comment model. Looking at the fetcher code, it tries to save:
- telegram_comment_id: The ID of the comment in Telegram
- parent_telegram_message_id: The ID of the post in Telegram (for reference)

Let me add these fields to the Comment model.

input.old_string:
# Timestamps
    created_at = Column(DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow)
    updated_at = Column(DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow, onupdate=datetime.utcnow)

    # Relationship to post
    post = relationship("Post", back_populates="comments")
input.new_string:
# Timestamps
    created_at = Column(DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow)
    updated_at = Column(DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow, onupdate=datetime.utcnow)

    # Telegram-specific fields (for imported comments)
    telegram_comment_id = Column(Integer, nullable=True, index=True)  # Original Telegram comment ID
    parent_telegram_message_id = Column(Integer, nullable=True)  # Telegram post ID this comment belongs to

    # Relationship to post
    post = relationship("Post", back_populates="comments")
